abstracts.cdata!:
The Water Resources Management Pilot
            Project will provide the funding for the preparation of the
            proposed Ceara Water Resources Management Project
            (PROGERIRH). Its objectives are to: 1) achieve a high level
            of quality at entry for the proposed PROGERIRH project; 2)
            develop and refine methodologies, institutional framework
            and strategies to be used in the implementation and
            sustainable operation and maintenance of the PROGERIRH
            project; 3) evaluate a new small trans-basin diversion
            project; and 4) evaluate an appropriate institutional
            framework for the development and operation of a
            hydro-meteorological network and technical support system
            for integrated water resource management in the State of
            Ceara. The components of this pilot project are the
            following: (i) Fortaleza Metropolitan Basin study; (ii)
            Jaguaribe/Icapui Basin project; (iii) Ibiapaba/Acarau
            Inter-basin system; and (iv) PROGERIRH preparation.
